Node.definition: = a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= action by which humans make a building or religious object ready for use ◄ usually by devoting it to a deity

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans acknowledge the elevated status of deities and give expression to that
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which someone delivers someone else from a perilous condition ◄ as if pulling that person out of a deep pit
= causative action where human or deities cause (other) humans to feel and show great joy
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.gloss: to cry out|to cry for help
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

= causative action by which humans or deities help or cause (other) humans to be restored to health or physical strength after a disease or an accident; this could also refer to the wound or disease itself
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to keep alive|to restore to life
Node.definition: = to cause an object to become or remain alive and well; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in most cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

Node.gloss: to go down (to the netherworld)|to die
Node.definition: literally: to go down (to the netherworld, death, the pit, the dust, silence, etc.); hence: = process by which humans die and descend into the world of the dead
= world of the dead, ◄ described as a pit, deep in the ground
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
literally: remembrance; hence: = appellation through which one can be remembered
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
= a very short length of time
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

= the state of being alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed
= state in which a condition or process takes place for an indefnite amount of time, ◄ as if it lives in that place
= action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person
= first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= particle marking a proposition as not true
literally: to be shaken; hence: = state in which humans are affected by difficult circumstances and feel worried and concerned
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which an object is able to withstand force

literally: to hide (one's) face (from someone); hence: = action by which a deity does not engage with people, and does not intervene neither in their favor nor to punish, ◄ as if he were enable to see them

Node.gloss: to be in anguish|to be dismayed
Node.definition: = state in which humans experience a great fear combined with severe distress, often accompanied by physical symptoms, such trembling and pain
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord

Node.gloss: to beg for mercy|to make supplication
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans try to win a favorable attitude from deities or from other humans ◄ by approaching that deity or person in a very humble way

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= possessions accumulated through advantageous transactions, in which part of the income can be kept for oneself as profit
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts

Node.gloss: to go down (to the netherworld)|to die
Node.definition: literally: to go down (to the netherworld, death, the pit, the dust, silence, etc.); hence: = process by which humans die and descend into the world of the dead
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= causative process by which humans or deities give events a different nature

= mourning ritual for someone who has died, or for another tragic event; this may include wailing (ילל) tearing one's clothes, putting on sackcloth (שַׂק) covering oneself with dust or ashes, fasting (צום) or eating specific food, cutting oneself (גדד) shaving one's head (קרח) covering part of one's face, etc.; this usually takes place during a specific period of time and ends after the burial has taken place, but it may also be repeated in later days to commemorate a tragic event
= action by which humans dance a round dance; ≈ associated with joy

Node.gloss: to ungird (someone's) sackcloth = to bring joy (to someone)
Node.definition: literally: to ungird (someone's) sackcloth; hence: = causative action by which deities bring joy into the life of humans, ◄ as if by removing the mourning clothes they wear
= a coarse dark material ◄ made of goat or camel hair; ► worn next to the skin as a sign of mourning or repentance

= to tie a belt or girdle around someone else's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming someone for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to clothe people with certain characteristics and qualities, such as joy, strength, and courage
= state in which humans feel and show great joy
= action by which one expresses one's respect and gratitude to someone else by uttering words at a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not
literally: glory; hence: = the inner person of a human being ◄ as the glory and pride of that individual

Node.gloss: to be silent|to keep silent|to remain silent|to be silenced
Node.definition: = to refrain from speaking
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
